title: BADecker
author: BADecker
content: I don't like watching videos. Much of the time they are simply distractions so that we can watch the pretty or ugly face of the podcaster. I'd much rather have it all written out, with the pertinent parts highlighted so I don't have to waste so much time. But...Dave Hodges is good. He has built up contacts from whom he gets inside info. Watch the video at the site, below.RED ALERT! SENATORS HOWLEY & JOHNSON UNVEIL MASSIVE NATIONAL SECURITY THREAT!Quote from: https://thecommonsenseshow.com/agenda-21-conspiracy-economics/red-alert-senators-howley-johnson-unveil-massive-national-security-threat-nsc-dod-dhs-bidenRED ALERT! SENATORS HOWLEY & JOHNSON UNVEIL MASSIVE NATIONAL SECURITY THREAT! NSC, DOD, DHS, BIDEN, MAYORKAS COMPLICIT IN ERASING 434 TERRORIST RECORDS TO ALLOW ADMISSION TO THE UNITED STATES.
